front.title: Negotiation of Extra Round Trip for Kerberos V5 Generic Security Services Mechanism

abstract.t: This Internet-Draft proposes an extension to the Kerberos V5 security mechanism for the Generic Security Services Application Programming Interface (GSS-API) for using an extra pair of security context tokens in order to recover from certain errors. Other benefits include: user2user authentication, authenticated errors (in some cases), and more.
